extension.description: Features: - Smart TV Mode. - Smart Interface allow the users to easily create thier own addon from within Kodi and share it with others. - Customized Fanart for each button. - Support unlimited URLs per content from varied sources such as Youtube, Dailymotion, Dropbox... - Smart Search button.. - Sorted and Organized contents.
